description:
What’s next in music is first on SoundCloud. 
 
Be the first to find new music. Discover trending artists, play songs and share your favorite playlists. 
 
Access the world’s largest music discovery platform
- That’s 300M+ tracks from 30M+ artists in 193 countries
 
Discover new and trending music, picked just for you
- Play curated mixes and playlists based on the songs you love
 
Find exclusive music on SoundCloud
- Play songs, DJ sets and remixes you can’t find on any other streaming platform
 
Grow your music collection
- Find and save trending hits, underground remixes, deep cuts and more.
- Build playlists with your favorite songs.
 
Find and connect with your music community 
- Follow your favorite artists and connect with music fans directly and discover their playlists.
- Like, Repost and comment on any track, directly in the music player.
- Share songs and trending playlists on the app and social media.
 
Upload your own tracks 
- Upload your own music directly on the app to tap into a global fanbase of millions and start trending.
 
Help independent artists get paid
- Your fan-powered streams puts money in the pockets of the artists YOU want to support. 
 
Enjoy free music streaming with SoundCloud FREE, or level up with SoundCloud Go or SoundCloud Go+ to remove ads, play songs offline and more premium features.
 
SOUNDCLOUD FREE:
- Play music from independent and established artists (with ads).
- Listen to albums and playlists with unlimited skips.
- Stream music on your Wear OS smartwatch.
 
SOUNDCLOUD Go:
- Listen without ads
- Save tracks to listen offline — Play your favorite songs and playlists anytime, anywhere
 
SOUNDCLOUD Go+:
- Unlock premium Go+ tracks
- Access high-quality audio streaming
- Upgrade your DJ sets with exclusive app integrations
- Listen without ads
- Save tracks to listen offline — hear your favorite songs and playlists anytime, anywhere
- Support your favorite independent artists through Fan-Powered Royalties
 
SoundCloud Go+ gives you offline and ad-free listening to everything from mainstream songs to trending DJ sets and remixes.
 
Need help? Get in touch:
 
https://soundcloudcommunity.com
https://help.soundcloud.com
https://twitter.com/SCsupport
 
SoundCloud is available in English, Brazilian Portuguese, Dutch, French, German, Italian and Spanish.
 
 
Privacy Policy: https://soundcloud.com/pages/privacy
Terms of Use: https://soundcloud.com/terms-of-use

With the Spotify app, you can explore an extensive library of music and podcasts for free. Curate the best playlists and stream millions of free songs, albums and original podcasts on your mobile or tablet. Subscribe to Spotify Premium to download and listen offline wherever you are, and unlock our catalogue of audiobooks.

Why choose Spotify as your go-to music and podcast app? Here, you can:
• Listen to over 100 million songs and 6 million podcast titles
• Explore our selection of specially-crafted artist playlists
• Easily search for your favourite songs, albums, artists and podcasts
• Discover personalised music recommendations tailored to your unique taste
• Subscribe to your favourite free podcasts so you never miss an episode and even curate your own podcast library

Spotify Free is more than a music player – find the sounds that you love and stream music and podcasts online for free. Enjoy personalised playlists or curate and share your own, discover the hottest new releases, explore upcoming events from your favourites and more.

• Stream millions of free songs and podcasts
• Create playlists with your favourite music
• Share songs and playlists with friends and family (feature restrictions may apply in some regions)
• Discover personalised playlists made just for you, and collaborate on playlists with your friends
• Enjoy your personal Discover Weekly playlist every week
• Stay in the know with the Release Radar and New Music Friday playlists
• Find nearby events and gigs by your favourite artists
• See your most played songs, genres, artists and more with yearly Spotify Wrapped
• Stream music across your devices with Spotify
• Use Spotify Connect and enjoy listening on smart speakers, desktop, laptop, smart TV, Chromecast, PlayStation®, Xbox®, smartwatch, in your car and more – limited number of device models apply

Spotify Premium – a great way to enjoy the benefits of an offline music player and stream music without Wi-Fi. By pressing download, you can access your songs, playlists, podcasts and audiobooks offline, wherever you are.
• Listen to music, podcasts and audiobooks – all in one place
• Ad-free music listening: enjoy your music with no ad interruptions
• Enjoy full on-demand playback
• Audiobooks in Premium are currently available in the UK, US, Australia, Ireland, New Zealand and Canada. Discover 250,000+ audiobook titles with 15 hours/month of available listening for Premium Individual subscribers and Duo & Family plan managers.
• Superior sound quality on supported devices
• AI DJ: a personalised guide that knows your music taste so well that it can choose what to play for you
• Enjoy on desktop, mobile phone, tablet, computer, smartwatch and in your car
• Listen and control the listening session together by hosting a Jam in real time with friends
• Download songs, podcasts and audiobooks for offline listening without an Internet connection
• No contract required – cancel your subscription whenever you want

Spotify lets you play music wherever you are. Listen to your favourite songs and discover new music, podcasts and audiobooks with the Spotify app!

LOVE SPOTIFY?
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/spotify
Follow us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@spotify

Tired of being restricted by Wi-Fi or network when listening to your favorite music?
Imagine a world where you can immerse yourself in music anytime, anywhere, without relying on an internet connection.

Now! We proudly present ASMR Musi, the ultimate solution for your music playback needs.

Asmr Musi is an all-in-one audio app designed to provide users with a complete audio journey. The app brings together a variety of soundscapes such as the crunch of chewing, the rustle of turning pages, the sound of soft whispers, the warmth of wood, the crinkling of packaging, the melodies of instruments, the click of nails, the scribbles of pens, and more.

Each auditory selection has been carefully curated to provide the best relaxation experience.
The app has an intuitive and easy-to-use interface that easily guides users through various sound categories and allows users to save bookmarks based on their personal preferences. In addition, it allows users to enrich their listening experience and broaden their sound horizons by recording personal audio files.

For those who want to keep their unique auditory moments forever, the in-app recording feature is a perfect solution. It allows users to capture, edit recordings, and manage their audio library by removing outdated tracks, ensuring a fresh and tailored listening experience at all times.

GuitarTuna is your go-to guitar app, with over 100 million downloads and counting! Tune your guitar in seconds with the free guitar tuner, explore guitar chords & tabs for 20,000+ songs, and learn how to play guitar songs you love with trainers, tutorials & personalized feedback.

Why you’ll love Guitartuna
• Tune any guitar, ukulele, violin or bass perfectly with easy-to-use tuning
• Switch seamlessly between guitar tuner, ukulele tuner, bass tuner & more
• Get guitar tabs & chords for your favorite songs
• Learn guitar songs with trainers, tutorials & personalized feedback
• Practice like a pro with essential tools for guitar
• Play songs you love at any skill level – guitar beginners included!
• Become a better guitar player with an all-in-one guitar app in your pocket

How it works
• Just pluck a string on your instrument and GuitarTuna detects the sound using your device’s microphone.
• You’ll get instant visual feedback while tuning. No cables needed.
• With our audio recognition technology, you’ll get insanely accurate tuning. Noise cancellation technology eliminates background noises while you tune.

Learn songs with guitar tutorials
• Learn guitar songs with video tutorials & interactive trainers
• Get personalized feedback to improve your guitar playing
• Create your own personalized learning path
• Get tips from expert guitarists

Play songs with guitar tabs & chords
• Explore guitar tabs for 20,000+ popular songs by top global artists
• Get pro-quality guitar chords & guitar tabs
• Choose guitar tabs & chords for your skill level
• Play at your own pace while chords & tabs sync with you
• Request guitar tabs & chords for your favorite songs
• New guitar songs & tabs added weekly!

Tools to practice guitar like a pro
• Metronome: Set your tempo & customize your time signature with the metronome tool
• Chord games: G chord giving you trouble? Learn, practice & master guitar chords with customizable games.
• Ear trainer: Improve your music skills & recognize chords by ear
• Chord library: Explore guitar chords with diagrams & audio
• Left-hand mode: Easily switch between right & left hand modes

Instruments
• Guitar
• Guitar 7-String
• Guitar 12-String
• Ukulele
• Cavaquinho
• Bass
• Bass 5-string
• Violin
• Viola
• Cello
• Fiddle
• Mandolin
• Balalaika
• Banjo
• Banjo 5-String

We’ve put a lot of love and effort into making GuitarTuna the tuner it is today. Your feedback is valuable to us, and you can be sure we’re listening. We recently added pro-quality guitar song chords and lyrics to the app because of the sheer amount of requests for them. Play your favorite songs anywhere, anytime, with our entire song library produced by professional musicians.

GuitarTuna Pro subscription: Subscribe for unlimited access. Subscriptions are monthly. Prices may vary in different countries. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s iTunes Account Settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.

GuitarTuna is developed by Yousician. Check out Yousician’s apps to learn and master guitar, ukulele, bass, piano or singing!

It’s pretty cool you actually read this far! Here’s a joke for you: What’s the difference between a bass and a tuna? You can tuna bass, but you can’t bass a tuna!

Now download the app and see how it is.
Send us your feedback on the joke and the app to support@guitartuna.com!

https://yousician.com/privacy-notice
https://yousician.com/terms-of-service

Create, share, and discover music without limits on BandLab – your all-in-one app for music creation, from ideation to distribution.

BandLab is your free song making and beat making app. Join over 60 million users expressing themselves freely on our social music platform. No matter your skill level or background, BandLab is your creative outlet with features designed for every step of your musical journey!

Record music on the go with an intuitive Digital Audio Workstation (DAW), built-in effects, and royalty free loops and samples – BandLab is the creative tool right in your pocket.

Create without limits with our multi-track Studio:
• An intuitive Digital Audio Workstation (DAW) to record, edit, and remix your music
• Apply built-in effects, or find loops and samples from our royalty-free sound packs to build a beat
• Access creator-friendly tools like Metronome, Tuner, AutoPitch (a pitch correction tool), and AudioStretch (a music transcription tool)
• Unlimited cloud storage and accessibility across all devices so you can take your Studio anywhere, and make music using just your desktop, tablet, or phone

Be part of a music-loving community:
• Connect and collaborate with like-minded artists
• Create playlists in your favorite genres
• Watch live streams from fellow creators

Propel your creator journey with BandLab Membership:
• Get early access to experimental features with Backstage Pass
• Score exclusive music industry access through Opportunities
• Release your music on major streaming platforms with Distribution
• Unlock more artist-centric features like Fan Reach and Profile Boost

Download BandLab now to explore a world of exciting possibilities!

► FEATURES:

• *NEW* Drum Machine – Our online sequencer makes it seamless to craft drum parts for your song. Create rhythmic drum patterns quickly with a library of genre-diverse drum sounds.
• Sampler – Make your own samples by recording sounds around you, or choose from over 15,000 royalty-free sounds and beats from BandLab Sounds to build a beat.
• 16-Track Studio – Bring your Studio anywhere. Access our multi-track DAW from anywhere – use it as an audio recording app, build a beat right from your phone, and more!
• 330+ Virtual MIDI Instruments – Need 808s for your beats, or synthesizers for your lead lines? Access over 330+ cutting-edge Virtual MIDI instruments to craft your beats right in Studio!
• Metronome and Tuner – Practice anywhere with our in-app Metronome and Tuner – designed for the modern music maker and producer.
• 300+ Vocal/Guitar/Bass Audio Presets – Unlock a curated library of world-class effects and presets for free. From ambient sounds to modulation effects, change up your sound in an instant.
• AutoPitch - Record your best vocals yet with this quality Auto-Tune alternative. Experiment and get creative with five unique vocal effects – Classic, Duet, Robot, Big Harmony, and Modern Rap.
• Looper – New to composing? Just pick a Looper pack in a genre you like, load it up, and you’ll have a starting point for building a simple beat or crafting a backing track!
• Mastering – Master unlimited tracks online for free before releasing your songs. Get a polished sound instantly with four mastering presets, created by Grammy-winning producers and sound engineers.
• Remix Tracks – Need inspiration for your next masterpiece? Put your unique twist on a public “Forkable” track shared by a fellow creator – remix their song and make it your own!
• Easy Beat Making - Craft a simple beat to rap or sing over with intuitive music making tools. Use royalty-free samples and artist packs as a quick starting point in Studio!
• Creator Connect - Connect with like-minded creators from around the world and start an epic music collaboration, wherever you are.

Terms of Use: https://blog.bandlab.com/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: https://blog.bandlab.com/privacy-policy/

Nowmusi is the ultimate iOS app designed to revolutionize your wake-up experience with personalized music. Say goodbye to the monotonous buzz of standard alarm sounds and greet each day with the melodies you love. Whether you prefer energetic beats to kickstart your morning or soothing tunes to wake up gently, Nowmusi offers the perfect solution tailored to your unique tastes and lifestyle. 

Key Features of Nowmusi

Customizable Alarm Songs: Whether it’s your favorite pop anthem, a relaxing instrumental, or a motivational track, Nowmusi allows you to personalize your wake-up soundscape to match your mood and preferences.

Multiple Alarms: Set multiple alarms for different times and days of the week. Customize each alarm with a different song, allowing you to vary your wake-up music based on your schedule or the day’s activities.

In App Purchase:
You can be a premium user and get more features through auto-renewable subscription:
Price of subscription:
Nowmusi_lifetime_vip: 39.99
Nowmusi_yearly_vip: 29.99
Nowmusi_weekly_vip: 2.99

• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account on confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during an active subscription period

Terms of service: https://nowmusi.net/terms.html
Privacy policy: https://nowmusi.net/privacy.html

Download Nowmusi and start building your personalized alarm today!

Amplify your imagination. Powered by the world’s most advanced AI music model, Suno transforms your ideas into songs—no instruments needed, just your creative vision. Whether you’re a shower-singer, aspiring songwriter, or charting artist, Suno empowers you to create and discover music like never before.

Generate music from prompts, images, or videos with the world’s best AI music model:
• Transform your ideas into fully-produced songs and beats with a single prompt. Create 10 songs or beats per day at no cost.
• Inspiration begins with you. Write a text prompt like "Create a rap song about walking my dog," sing a melody, hum a tune, or tap out a beat.
• Record or upload audio to personalize your music, or generate songs from images and videos.

Write original lyrics with effortlessly:
• Whether you're in your feels with emotional ballads, hyped on energetic rap verses, or hooked on catchy pop, our lyrics generator and AI songwriter helps you craft custom lyrics that match your style and creative vision.

Create playlists for every mood and moment:
• Curate your personal AI music library and organize your favorite tracks, beats, and instrumentals into playlists you can revisit anytime.
• Manage your AI songs, view track details, and fine-tune your playlists—your music making journey is uniquely yours with Suno.

Discover new music and connect with artists:
• Stay inspired by listening to tracks created by other users and explore the best AI music across genres like rock, rap, hip hop, pop, and more.
• Find fresh favorites by browsing trending music and follow artists to stay connected.
• Discover new voice styles, AI covers, rising talent, and beat makers from around the world.

Music has no boundaries at Suno. Anything you imagine can take shape as a song to share. Whether you're taking your first steps in music making or chasing your next hit, infinite possibilities begin with a simple prompt in our AI song generator. Feeling pro? Take full creative control: adjust vocals, tweak structure, fine-tune melodies, and edit every detail to your vision.

Suno is how imagination becomes music, and music becomes yours.

—

• Your subscription will be charged to your Apple Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew (at the duration selected) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.

• Your current subscription may not be canceled during the active subscription period; however, you can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your Apple Account Settings after purchase.

• Our Terms of Service: https://suno.com/terms

Forget about having to look for new phone ringtones once and for all! 

Our ringtone maker allows you to create any ringtone you like. 

Pick an existing audio or video file to cut yourself a unique ringtone on the go. 

With Garage Ringtones, you get an easy-to-use and intuitive ringtone maker packed with useful features:

Set your new ringtones from existing files;
Customize your notification sounds;
Cut your favorite tunes and audio files to get 100% custom ringtones in no time;
Set unique ringtones for any contacts you desire to know who’s calling you without looking at the screen.  

And the cherry on the pie? Garage Ringtones is making ringtone selection easier for you! We have a dedicated TikTok channel where we handpick the juiciest and most popular songs for you to download and use as ringtones. 

Our TikTok channel is brimming with content. From recent hits to cult classics, Garage Ringtones’ collection of songs is always there for you!

Garage Ringtones uses GarageBand to export edited songs or audio files to ringtones. Don’t worry - the process is very straightforward and won’t take longer than a minute or two. Garage Ringtones features an in-app video with step-by-step guidelines on exporting your favorite tunes without breaking a sweat!

The app also supports ‘fade in’ and ‘fade out’ features and allows you to browse your edit history. 

With Garage Ringtones, you get the one ringtone maker to rule them all! User-friendly, with a brief and detailed tutorial, the possibility to use any TikTok audio as custom ringtones, and bonus access to our TikTok channel with all the top hits from both modern music artists and famous classical performers. 

Support: https://appflow.ae/garage-ringtones-support/
Privacy Policy: https://appflow.ae/privacy-policy/
Terms & Conditions: https://appflow.ae/garage-ringtones-terms-conditions/
Contact Us: support@appflow.ae

Discover a distraction-free way to enjoy your favorite tunes with The Music App. Designed for simplicity and ease of use, it lets you create custom playlists, explore fresh tracks, and enjoy high-quality audio wherever you go. The Music App keeps your music front and center, free from unnecessary extras.



-Pro Version Features
Upgrade to the Pro Version to unlock the following premium benefits:

Remove All Ads: Enjoy uninterrupted music playback with no distractions.
Unlimited Free Music: Access an extensive library of tracks to suit every mood.




-Subscription Plans
Choose a plan that fits your needs:

$4.99/Month: Cancel anytime.
$19.99/Year: Save big with our best-value annual plan. Cancel anytime.
Whether you're on your morning commute, hitting the gym, or relaxing at home, The Music App is the perfect companion for your music journey.




Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/soundplayerpolicyprivacy/accueil
Terms of Use: https://sites.google.com/view/sound-layer-termes-conditions/accueil

The app plays sounds that can help you test your speakers.

With the help of a sound level meter, you can find out how many decibels and hertz the device you are checking reproduces.

You can also find out if the microphone on your phone is clogged.


Upgrade to Premium:
- Unlock Unlimited Sound Testing: Test your speakers unlimitedly. 
- Get Unlimited dB Meter: Measure the noise levels in your surroundings endlessly.
- Enjoy an Ad-Free Experience: No ads to interrupt your experience!

Subscription Details:
Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription with a free trial period will automatically renew to a paid subscription. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase. You can cancel your subscription or free trial in the iTunes settings at least 24-hours before the end of the free trial period. The cancellation will take effect the day after the last day of the current subscription period and you will be downgraded to the free service.


Subscription Options:
- Weekly: $3.99
- Monthly: $3.99
- 6-Month: $12.99
- Annual: $14.99

For other currencies, the price corresponds to the same tier on the App Store Pricing Matrix.

Bring out the singer in you on StarMaker——A popular karaoke & social singing app with 50M＋users globally! Whether you are a passionate singing enthusiast or a seasoned professional, StarMaker allows you to refine the voice and showcase your music talents. You can sing on your own, duet with friends, or sing alongside recordings of popular artists. Record your voice, create your MVs, and enhance your voice with professional audio editors. 

Sing Karaoke Songs
No matter you like pop or hip-hop, R&B or folk, jazz or blues, just pick your favorite songs from millions of songs, sing along with the high-quality backing music and rolling lyrics, and edit your recordings with voice effects and video filters. You can also duet with top artists and go Live to broadcast your music concerts and win likes and fans like a superstar! 

Professional Sound Effects
Supported by professional music team, the audio editor function offers you the chance to get varied sound effects when recording songs. Add sound effects you like, adjust the pitch based on your vocal range, and denoise or reduce latency to have a smooth and professional vocal performance.

With the popular singing app and social music community, you can: 
+ Pick your favorite songs and latest hits from millions of local and international songs with rolling lyrics and high-quality backing tracks.
+ Record with professional audio editor, using pitch correction and special effects like Karaoke, Studio, Superstar, Gig, Pop, etc.
+ Get real-time pitch feedback and Radar Chart Analysis of your voice to learn how to improve pitch precision, rhythm, singing techniques, emotion, and song choice.
+ Edit your selfie music videos with beautiful filters like Vintage, Cream, Sunset, Flower, Spring, etc.
+ Use video templates to create unique MVs with lyrics.
+ Share your covers on TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, WhatsApp & more. Listen and record the music moments.
+ Sing and listen to songs with new friends in Live Duet to connect with the world seamlessly through music.
+ Host your online karaoke parties with friends in Party Rooms.
+ Join a "Family" social community to stay connected with other music lovers with similar tastes.

【STARMAKER PRO AUTOMATIC SUBSCRIPTION SERVICE DESCRIPTION】

  a) 1 Week - $7.99

3. Payment: The purchase is credited to the iTunes account after the user confirms the purchase and makes the payment.
4. Automatic Renewal: Apple's iTunes account will be charged within 24 hours before the expiration date, and the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period after the successful deduction.
5. Cancel Renewal: You can manage your automatic subscription service or disenable it by going to "Settings" -->"iTunes Store and App Store"-->"Apple ID"-->"Check Apple ID"-->"Subscriptions" from Apple. It can be cancelled  24 hours before the end of each billing period, and no fee will be deducted within 24 hours before the expiration.
6. Service Agreement
a) You can read our privacy policy at https://m.starmakerstudios.com/setting/privacy/sm/index
b) You can read our terms of service at https://m.starmakerstudios.com/setting/terms/sm/index

A First Music Player without interruptive ADS
Melodista is a player for music lovers. Optimized to match cutting edge iOS user experience, integrated with the latest system technologies.

A simple Playlist system ensures that you will be able to easily access your music and arrange them in a way you like. Collect all your music from your authorized sources in one app.
Melodista player is fast and efficient.

Top features:
- Create and organize folder playlists

- Manage, copy, move, rename and transfer files
- Supports many audio formats
- Edit Song Picture and name
- Share with friends

Access the world's largest catalogue of guitar, bass & ukulele chords, tabs, and lyrics. Challenge yourself to learn your favourite songs and more!
 
You have choices galore:
 
• Search for songs by genre, rating, your ability, tuning level
• Explore UG Tab collections. Use the finder for your faves, fall in love with something new, feel the nostalgic vibes. Search by themes like House or Acoustic, or check out the latest album releases. Find collections based on your interests such as Star Wars or funky Bollywood beats.
• Focus on guitar techniques, find songs personal to you in collections from professional guitarists
• Anytime you feel inspired to share a song, create and upload your shot on the spot. It’s that easy! Share the best parts of your performance with your like minded community of fellow musicians.
• Reach your true musical potential – learn to play with UG Courses here. Access over 2500 lessons for any skill level and instrument type from guitar, drums to piano and more. Learn different styles and techniques with guidance from professional musicians. Progress at your own speed and on any device, anytime, anywhere.
• Play over 26,000 popular songs in their original sound with Tonebridge Guitar Effects
 
And it doesn’t end there
 
Check out all these features:
• More than 1,000,000 songs to explore guitar, bass & ukulele chords, tabs, and lyrics
• Watch videos of songs to refresh your memory or use as backing tracks
• Compile your favourite tabs in playlists from our tab collections
• Create ‘Personal’ tabs to edit chords, lyrics or change tabs to suit your needs
• Option to Switch to left-handed mode 
• Set a font style and size to match the tab
• Offline access to favourite tabs - available at all times
• Enjoy dark mode for a gig
 
With a Pro account:
• Use interactive tabs to play songs note by note, at your own pace
• Select the chord variation that best suits you from the world's biggest library of chords
• Use ‘Simplify’  to make difficult songs easier
• Jam with high quality tabs - over 22,500 that include backing tracks and synchronised lyrics
• Hit the right tempo with metronome
• Transpose songs to get just the right tone for you
• Take advantage of autoscroll during your practice sessions
• Achieve the right sound with the built-in guitar tuner
• Share, print, and export your fave songs
 
Problems or feedback?
We are always eager to improve your Tabs experience and strive for excellence in doing so. Let us help you in person by contacting our development team at support.ios@ultimate-guitar.com, and we will endeavour to meet your needs.
Please do not post bug reports or feature requests as an App Store review.
  
Subscription information:
• The "UG Pro + UG Courses + UG Sing" subscription gives you unlimited access to the app's premium content and features
• The subscription price is $9.99/monthly,  $59.99/yearly*
• Payment will be charged to your  iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen package

More than 50,000 radio stations of 200 countries and territories available in this app. From sports to news and music. With more than 200 countries and territories available, there are many kinds of stations for you to choose from.

GO FM Radio is the easiest way to tune in to your favorite FM radio, AM radio & online radio stations. It's really easy to find any global radio station. Search by genre to discover new music e.g. pop radio, rock radio or by category to unearth new stations e.g. news radio, live sports radio. You can also search by country, state or city.Listen to your favorite free FM & AM stations.

Listen to your favorite free FM & AM stations including: NPR Radio, BBC Radio, MRN, 77 WABC, La Mega 97.9, KNBR & WNYC. Catch up on news, listen to music or Christian radio & tune in to a huge range of live sports radio stations to catch the latest action from the NFL, MLB, NBA, MLS, NHL & more.

- Find new podcasts with easy-to-navigate categories

Live Sports Stations

Search for Radio and Podcasts

Discover
Explore popular AM/FM radio stations and podcasts organized in clear categories within our Discover area. Get inspired by our editorial recommendations and find a wide range of content, including jazz, rock, and classic radio.

Favorites

MUZO AI — THE MUSIC YOU NEVER KNEW YOU HAD IN YOU

Remember that tune stuck in your head while brushing your teeth this morning? Yes, that one. What if it didn’t just fade away? What if it became something real — a track, a beat, maybe even the song that completely shifts your mood? That’s where Muzo AI steps in.

It doesn’t matter if you’ve been producing since the dial-up days or barely know the difference between a drum kit and a toolbox. Muzo takes your scribbled idea — a quick note, a mood, a “what if it sounded like this?” — and turns it into something you can play, share, or put on repeat.

WHAT CAN YOU DO HERE?
Turn vague ideas into actual songs.
Say it, type it, hum it — Muzo AI gets the idea and builds your sound around it.

Let the algorithms do the work.
All that AI magic runs in the background, producing polished beats, rich chords and catchy hooks — pop, hip-hop, EDM, whatever you fancy.

Ignite your creativity.
A stash of templates and presets sits like half-open doors — step through one and, boom, inspiration.

Save. Share. Make it yours.
High-quality exports for your socials, streams, or just for yourself.

WHO’S IT FOR?
Pros: You know the grind. Let Muzo handle the boring bits so you can just… create.
Beginners: Never touched a DAW? Doesn’t matter. You’ll still make something worth listening to.
Everyone else: Music doesn’t need permission slips. Muzo leaves the door wide open.

WHY CHOOSE MUZO?
Because it’s quick, not complicated.
Because it sounds like a studio without the studio price tag.
Because one tap could lead to the song you didn’t know you could make.

So… maybe stop scrolling. Or don’t — but if that tune in your head keeps getting louder, Muzo AI is ready to make it real.

Muzo Pro is required to create music.
With Pro, you get unlimited AI music generation for a seamless creative flow.
No cost needed: write lyrics with AI and browse the world’s largest library of ready-to-use AI tracks.

DOWNLOAD IT. TRY IT. SURPRISE YOURSELF.

Bose Connect unlocks the full potential of your Bose Bluetooth® Product.  

EASY ACCESS TO EVERYTHING
Get quick access to the key features on your products, like the auto-off timer, volume control and battery readings. And it’s the easiest way to manage multiple Bluetooth connections. But that’s just the beginning.

SHARE THE MUSIC
MUSIC SHARE lets you listen together. Now two pairs of Bose® wireless headphones can share the experience—listen together, at the same time, while one of you DJs. New PARTY MODE lets you sync two SoundLink® speakers for double the audio—ideal for listening in two different places and new STEREO MODE immerses you in music by separating the sound into Left and Right channels across two paired speakers for that amazing stereo experience.

GET THE MOST OUT OF YOUR HEADPHONES
CONTROLLABLE NOISE CANCELLATION on our QC®30 headphones lets you decide how much of the world to let in by adjusting the level of noise cancellation right in the app. And the built-in HEART RATE MONITOR for our SoundSport® Pulse headphones displays your heart rate clearly in the app.
 
AND SO MUCH MORE
From viewing product details to personalising settings, get the most out of your Bose wireless products. It even downloads the latest software in the background and only installs it when you’re ready. See how our simple app can make all the difference.
 
 * NOTE * 
Bose Connect works with Bose Frames, QC®35, SoundSport® wireless, SoundSport® Pulse wireless, SoundSport® Free wireless, QuietControl™ 30, SoundLink® wireless II, ProFlight® headphones, SoundWear Companion speaker, SoundLink® Color II, SoundLink® Revolve, SoundLink® Revolve+, SoundLink® Micro and S1 Pro® speakers

Join Smule’s global music community, where you can record solos, duets, and group performances - with or without video. Elevate your singing with professional voice effects and share your creations with millions worldwide. Explore a vast library across genres like pop, rock, R&B, country, K-pop, and more. From chart-topping hits to classics, Smule has something for everyone. Stay on pitch with real-time scrolling lyrics and our pitch guide for flawless performances.

•  Join Exciting Challenges: Participate in regular karaoke contests and events to showcase your talent and win rewards.

Connecting the World Through Music™: At Smule, we believe music is a universal language that brings people together. Join our diverse community of music lovers from the UK and around the world, and share in the joy of creating and experiencing music together.

Download Smule Today and Start Your Musical Journey!
